creative.name: Creative Profile
creative.description: You are attracted to innovation, art and creation. You like to express your ideas and work on original projects.

technical.name: Technical Profile
technical.description: You excel at solving complex problems, logic and technology. You are methodical and precise.

social.name: Social Profile
social.description: You have a strong interest in helping others, communicating and working in teams. You are empathetic and a good listener.

organizational.name: Organizational Profile
organizational.description: You are organized, like to manage projects and lead teams. You have a sense of responsibility.

entrepreneurial.name: Entrepreneurial Profile
entrepreneurial.description: You are independent, like to take calculated risks and create your own path. You are visionary.
